stacks 
works Learn more about us Newsletter Stacks Ecosystem Updates Get regular updates from Hiro PBC via email. We usually send two updates a month, as well as bigger quarterly updates covering the Stacks ecosystem. Subscribe Community Join us on discord User Avatar
We won't be able to see, access, or track your activity You'll get a Secret Key that automatically encrypts everything you do I'm new to Stacks Continue with Secret Key How Stacks Works Sign In Secret Key Save The Secret Key you've entered is invalid Welcome Back! Access your account at any time by clicking on the avatar icon, on the top right corner. Discover Stacks App How it works The app keeps everything you do private with Blockstack's Secret Key technology
Normally, apps keep your data for them to use. When you have a Secret Key, you no longer have to trust the app with your data because the app won't have access. 

What is Blockstack?
Blockstack is the open-source technology that generates your Secret Key. There's no company that owns or controls Blockstack, it is independent. Go to blockstack.org to learn more. 

Encryption
Encryption is always on. It locks everything you do in the app into useless codes. Because of this, the app can't see or track your activity. Your data can only be unlocked with the key that you own. No one else has this key, not even the app, so no one else can unlock your data 

What is a Secret Key?
Your Secret Key unlocks your data. It's created independently from the app to make sure that the app doesn't have it. An open-source protocol called Blockstack generates your Secret Key when you sign up. Nobody but you will have your Secret Key, to make sure that only you have access to your data. 

When will I need my Secret Key?
You'll need your Secret Key to prove it's you when you use the app on a new device, such as a new phone or laptop. After that, your Secret Key will stay active to keep you safe and private in the apps you use on that device.
This is how others will see you on other apps. Choose Username Username is not available Something went wrong>
Circle Settings Accounts Create a new account Log out View Secret Key back button Copy Secret Key unknown
Your Secret Key Here’s your Secret Key: 12 words that prove it’s you when you want to use it on a new device. Once lost it’s lost forever, so save it somewhere you won’t forget. Save your Secret Key Store your secret key somewhere safe, along with other critical, private information such as passwords. Once lost, it’s lost forever. So save it somewhere you won’t forget.
